/* AttachSettingMapper.getAttachSettings [AttachSetting.xml] */ select t.task_class_nm, t.task_class_desc, t.accept_ext, t.limit_cnt, t.limit_size , t.drag_drop_yn, case when t.drag_drop_yn='Y' then '가능' else '불가능' end as drag_drop_yn_nm , t.multiple_sel_yn, case when t.multiple_sel_yn='Y' then '가능' else '불가능' end as multiple_sel_yn_nm , t.preview_yn, case when t.preview_yn='Y' then '예' else '아니오' end as preview_yn_nm , t.picture_explain_yn, case when t.picture_explain_yn='Y' then '예' else '아니오' end as picture_explain_yn_nm , t.encrypt_yn, case when t.encrypt_yn='Y' then '암호화' else '비암호화' end as encrypt_yn_nm , t.use_yn, case when t.use_yn='Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_nm , t.create_user_id, cu.user_nm as create_user_nm, format(t.create_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as create_dt , t.update_user_id, uu.user_nm as update_user_nm, format(t.update_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as update_dt , case when dbo.GET_USER_NM(t.update_user_id) = '' then dbo.GET_USER_NM(t.create_user_id) else dbo.GET_USER_NM(t.update_user_id) end as writer_user_nm , case when t.update_dt is null then convert(date, t.create_dt) else convert(date, t.update_dt) end as writer_dt from com_attach_setting t inner join com_user cu on t.create_user_id = cu.user_id left join com_user uu on t.update_user_id = uu.user_id where 1=1
and t.task_class_nm like '%'+#{taskClassNm}+'%'
and t.task_class_desc like '%'+#{taskClassDesc}+'%'
order by writer_dt desc, t.task_class_nm

/* AttachSettingMapper.getAttachSetting [AttachSetting.xml] */ select t.task_class_nm, t.task_class_desc, t.accept_ext, t.limit_cnt, t.limit_size , t.drag_drop_yn, case when t.drag_drop_yn='Y' then '가능' else '불가능' end as drag_drop_yn_nm , t.multiple_sel_yn, case when t.multiple_sel_yn='Y' then '가능' else '불가능' end as multiple_sel_yn_nm , t.preview_yn, case when t.preview_yn='Y' then '예' else '아니오' end as preview_yn_nm , t.picture_explain_yn, case when t.picture_explain_yn='Y' then '예' else '아니오' end as picture_explain_yn_nm , t.encrypt_yn, case when t.encrypt_yn='Y' then '암호화' else '비암호화' end as encrypt_yn_nm , t.use_yn, case when t.use_yn='Y' then '사용' else '미사용' end as use_yn_nm , t.create_user_id, cu.user_nm as create_user_nm, format(t.create_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as create_dt , t.update_user_id, uu.user_nm as update_user_nm, format(t.update_dt, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as update_dt from com_attach_setting t inner join com_user cu on t.create_user_id = cu.user_id left join com_user uu on t.update_user_id = uu.user_id where 1=1 and t.task_class_nm = #{taskClassNm}
